about.subtitle: with Purpose & Passion
bio: I'm Huda Khan, a Senior Communication Designer based in Karachi, Pakistan. With over 4 years of experience, I specialize in creating comprehensive brand identities and digital experiences that drive business growth.

Currently leading design initiatives at Bazaar Technologies, Pakistan's largest B2B e-commerce platform, I've had the privilege of working on products that impact millions of users and generate substantial revenue.
My approach combines strategic thinking with aesthetic excellence, ensuring every design decision serves both user needs and business objectives.

items.description: Leading design initiatives across all company verticals, managing a team of 4 designers, and driving design strategy for products serving 17,000+ merchants.
Worked with various clients on brand identity, packaging design, and digital product design projects.
Specialized in Visual Communication Design with focus on brand identity and digital design.
